item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description:
Title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
Genre: Action , Indie , Simulation
Developer: threeW
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

In a world where the dead turn into zombies, your job is to manage your very own Graveyard! Perform burials and cremations, fulfill visitor requests, manage facilities, and keep your staff and defenses in top shape. But when night falls, everything changes. The dead may rest, but the zombies don’t. They are coming for your precious work!

Visitor Satisfaction is Key

After processing the bodies, visitors will return to check on their loved ones. Your duty is to keep graves intact while providing fresh flowers and maintaining a welcoming environment. Every visit rewards you with valuable bonuses to help your business thrive.

Visitors can also stop by the Chapel to rest and browse the Souvenir Shop for small keepsakes like candles and incenses. A clean and decorated graveyard encourages greater generosity while donating!

Build your Defenses

Each night, waves of zombies will come with their numbers growing and special zombie types emerging, hungry for freshly buried bodies and for you. From basic defenses like barbed wires and fences to advanced machines like automatic turrets, keep your defenses upgraded, repaired, and fully stocked with ammo to withstand the night.

Trust your Arsenal

With a variety of weapons, including pistols, rifles, shotguns, and your trusty shovel, you are the ultimate force against the Zombies. As you level up, unlock and purchase new weapons to become even stronger. Just make sure to stock up on enough ammo!

Even a Graveyard Can Be Cozy Sometimes!

Use your Farming Area to grow different flowers for profit and vegetables to simply eat and restore your energy and health. With Upgrades, you can even unlock a Grinder to turn zombie parts into Fertilizer. Decorate your Graveyard with benches, lights, and other ornaments to make it truly your own.

Expand and Upgrade Your Facilities

Your graveyard isn’t just a resting place, it's a business, and every upgrade matters. Expand your burial areas and upgrade your crematorium with more furnaces and automated systems. Improve your water supply , manage resource production , and decorate your grounds to stay ahead of growing demands.

Hire a team of employees to help with day-to-day tasks: the Florist keeps flowers running, the Gravekeeper maintains burials and cremations, the Gardener keeps your farm in check, and the Technician ensures all machines run smoothly.

Every improvement helps you stay one step ahead of both business demands and the undead threat.

Key Features

  • Manage and expand your own graveyard while balancing business and survival

  • Build and maintain defenses against nightly zombie attacks

  • Perform burials, cremations, and keep visitors satisfied with flowers and souvenirs

  • Operate a Chapel with a donation system and a fully stocked Souvenir Shop

  • Hire staff like Florists, Gravekeepers, Gardeners, and Technicians

  • Upgrade facilities including the crematorium, farming area, and water systems

  • Unlock new weapons and enhance your combat skills

  • Customize your graveyard with decorations and functional upgrades

  • Experience a mix of management, strategy, and first-person action

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 970 / AMD RX 470 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Supports FSR and DLSS. A compatible NVIDIA or AMD graphics card is required for the best performance.
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
    • Processor: i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or better
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 XT or better
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Supports FSR and DLSS. A compatible NVIDIA or AMD graphics card is required for the best performance.

item.title: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma
item.description:
Title: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Marvelous Inc.
Publisher: XSEED Games , Marvelous USA, Inc. , Marvelous Europe
Franchise: Rune Factory
Release Date: Jun 4, 2025




About This Game

The Celestial Collapse—a calamity caused by a colossal object crashing into the eastern lands known as Azuma. The devastating impact sent fragments of terrain to the skies above and the seas below. With the earth shattered, the power provided by the runes ceased to flow. The gods of nature vanished soon after. Mountains crumbled and fields withered, leaving the people with nothing…not even hope.

You awaken, startled by a dream of dueling dragons. You don’t remember how or why, but a voice resonates within you.

"Accept the power of an Earth Dancer. Use this power to save the land."

Experience Rune Factory reimagined! Guardians of Azuma is an all-new adventure that takes place in the never-before-seen eastern country of Azuma. Embrace your Earth Dancer powers and fight against the corruption spreading throughout Azuma to bring hope back to this once-prosperous land.

Bold New Abilities and Weapons

As an Earth Dancer, use the power of dance, sacred treasures, and fresh weapons like the Bow and Talisman to purify the land, your farms, and undo the Blight’s damage.

It Takes a Village

Don’t just mind the farm—rebuild entire villages! Construct and place buildings, enticing people to return to the villages and contribute. Revive the gods to bring vitality and valuable resources back to the plagued lands.

Your Fantasy Japanese Life

Experience beautiful Japanese-inspired character designs and aesthetics—from festivals, events, and monsters. Explore Azuma’s natural landscapes and its seasonal-themed locales steeped in tradition.

Classic Romance and Relationships

Choose between male and female protagonists, then befriend or romance any of the eligible candidates in fully voiced scenarios. Recruit these new friends to aid you in battle, too!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 and 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 SUPER
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 and 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 20 GB available space

item.title: Lunar Eclipse
item.description:
Title: Lunar Eclipse
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Early Access
Developer: Black Rabbit's Tales
Publisher: Black Rabbit's Tales
Release Date: Jun 4, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jun 4, 2025




About This Game

Exploration

Explore atmospheric, detailed locations and enjoy realistic graphics with a carefully crafted environment. Overcome obstacles, climb over barriers, crawl through tight spaces, and scale heights—only the most determined will find their way forward.

Puzzles

You will encounter various puzzles along your path, solving which will be the key to understanding the true nature of these events.

Atmosphere

Step into the role of a fragile girl and feel the silence of the dark corridors. Explore the shadowy locations hidden around every corner of this once-familiar place.

Story

You open your eyes—it's a familiar ceiling, but something feels off. The silence is too deep. The place that was your home since childhood now feels empty, lifeless... almost unfamiliar.

Where is everyone? Why did they leave you behind?

To find the answers, you’ll have to move forward—through the unsettling darkness, through abandoned hallways hiding unknown dangers. But you won’t give up. Because you have a purpose. And if the world has truly fallen… then someone has to save it.

Combat

A unique close-combat system has been designed to make every encounter intense and dangerous. Even the simplest zombies are now formidable threats. With only a kitchen knife as your main weapon, combat takes place at a dangerously close distance. Experience a classic combat system where every move matters.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64bit) or later
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
    • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB VRAM)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: To achieve optimal performance on minimal required hardware, I recommend playing at 1080p with Resolution Scale set to ~65% and all graphics settings on High. This should provide a smooth 60 FPS experience with good visual quality. Use this configuration as a starting point and adjust settings accordingly if your hardware is below or above the minimum requirements.
    Recommended:
    • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: DELTARUNE Soundtrack
item.description:
Title: DELTARUNE Soundtrack
Developer: tobyfox
Release Date: Jun 4, 2025




About This Content

Crash! Bang! Boom! It's the music of DELTARUNE !

Written by the composer of classic UNDERTALE tracks like "Long Elevator",

This soundtrack Is guaranteed to have over 100 of the music of DELTARUNE !

(This Item will be updated with the release of every Chapter.)

item.title: DELTARUNE
item.description:
Title: DELTARUNE
Genre: Indie , RPG
Developer: tobyfox
Publisher: tobyfox
Release Date: Jun 4, 2025




About This Game

The next adventure in the UNDERTALE series has appeared!

Fight (or spare) alongside new characters in UNDERTALE 's parallel story, DELTARUNE ...!

Featuring

  • A massive soundtrack and story written by Toby Fox!

  • Meet new and endearing main characters, as well as familiar faces like Toriel, Sans, as more. Huh? Papyrus? No, he's busy. Sorry

  • Smooth and expressive pixel-animation by Temmie. She also has a new hat (in-game)

  • A linear, chapter-based system that you can pick up from anywhere.

  • Creative bullet-dodging based battles inspired by games like Touhou and Chrono Trigger.

  • Jevilishly difficult hidden bosses.

  • And...

  • ...

  • ... only 1 ending...?

    Try Chapter 1 and 2 for free now!

    Chapters 3-4 are coming soon. Look bro.

    FAQ

  • Can you pet dogs in the first 2 chapters?

    • (crying) This FAQ is over!

    [/dog]

Windows

MacOS
